'''A Treasure Map Left for Shitoki''' is a quest item obtained after talking to [[Shitoki]] with four [[Treasure Map Fragment (Tsurumi Island)|Treasure Map Fragments]]. It is used during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[A Gift To Shitoki, Wrapped In Conches]]" to locate a buried chest.
